book.synopsis: Dr. Kay Scarpetta, the chief medical examiner in Richmond, Virginia, is determined to stop a serial killer responsible for a gruesome trail of stranglings but has difficulty finding out what the victims had in common, an investigation undermined by sabotage by someone close to her. Reissue.
book.dimensions: Height: 6.75 Inches, Length: 4 Inches, Weight: 0.2 Pounds, Width: 1 Inches
